title: Third Doctor (2)
description:
The Third Doctor is an incarnation of the Doctor, the main character of the BBC science fiction television series Doctor Who. He was portrayed by actor Jon Pertwee. 
Exiled by the Time Lords to Earth for a significant period of his life, the Third Doctor was a distinguished man of high class and gadgetry, often tinkering away and privy with machines. He also liked to share his wisdom with those who had open minds, but his patience would quickly dissolve if something annoyed him.
